cuts.scene_description: 夜明けの街並み。桜の花びらが風に舞う中、遠くに学校のシルエット
cuts.action: カメラが街並みをゆっくりパン。桜吹雪が画面を横切る
cuts.lighting: morning golden hour, soft pink tones
cuts.image_prompt: extreme wide shot, dawn cityscape with cherry blossoms, school silhouette in distance, sakura petals floating, rule of thirds composition, golden hour lighting, hopeful mood, anime style, pastel colors, 16:9
cuts.video_prompt: slow pan right across cherry blossom-filled cityscape at dawn, sakura petals drifting through frame, soft morning light, 6 seconds, peaceful and hopeful atmosphere, maintain golden hour aesthetic throughout
cuts.veo3_prompt: Slow horizontal pan across anime cityscape at dawn, cherry blossom petals floating gently in golden morning light, school building silhouette visible in background, peaceful and hopeful mood, 6 seconds
cuts.sora2_prompt: Dawn cityscape with cherry blossoms, camera panning slowly right, sakura petals drifting through warm golden light, anime aesthetic, soft pastel colors, 6 seconds

cuts.scene_description: 平凡な女子中学生・桜が遅刻しそうで慌てて走っている姿
cuts.action: 制服姿の桜が食パンをくわえて角を曲がる。髪が風になびく
cuts.image_prompt: medium shot, anime middle school girl in uniform running with toast in mouth, cherry blossom petals around her, centered composition, bright morning sunlight, energetic cheerful expression, long brown hair flowing, anime style, vibrant colors, 16:9
cuts.video_prompt: tracking shot following running schoolgirl, hair and skirt flowing in wind, cherry blossoms swirling around, bright energetic movement, 6 seconds, cheerful and lively atmosphere
cuts.veo3_prompt: Medium tracking shot of anime schoolgirl running late with toast, hair flowing dynamically, cherry blossoms in motion, bright cheerful energy, 6 seconds
cuts.sora2_prompt: Anime girl in school uniform running energetically, camera tracking her movement, cherry blossom petals swirling, bright morning light, dynamic and cheerful, 6 seconds

cuts.scene_description: 突然、眩しい光が桜の前に降り注ぐ。魔法のペンダントが空中に浮かぶ
cuts.action: ペンダントが回転しながら光を放つ。桜が驚いて立ち止まる
cuts.lighting: magical glow, pink and white sparkles
cuts.image_prompt: close-up shot, magical pendant floating in air, rotating and glowing with pink and white light, sparkles and light particles surrounding it, centered tight composition, mysterious magical atmosphere, anime style, brilliant colors, 16:9
cuts.video_prompt: slow zoom in on magical pendant rotating in mid-air, emitting pink and white sparkles, light particles floating around, mysterious magical energy, 6 seconds, enchanting atmosphere
cuts.veo3_prompt: Close-up of magical pendant rotating in air with pink glow, sparkles radiating outward, slow zoom emphasizing mystical power, 6 seconds
cuts.sora2_prompt: Magical pendant floating and spinning, glowing pink and white light, sparkles surrounding, camera zooming in slowly, mysterious and magical, anime style, 6 seconds

cuts.scene_description: 変身シーケンス開始。桜の周りに魔法陣が展開
cuts.action: 足元から光の魔法陣が広がり、桜の体が光に包まれる
cuts.image_prompt: wide shot, anime magical girl transformation, glowing magic circle spreading from feet, girl enveloped in colorful light, diagonal dynamic composition, intense magical lighting with pink blue gold colors, powerful exciting mood, anime style, 16:9
cuts.video_prompt: circular dolly around transforming magical girl, magic circle expanding from ground, colorful light enveloping character, dynamic transformation effects, 6 seconds, powerful and exciting energy
cuts.veo3_prompt: Wide circular dolly shot of magical girl transformation, magic circle spreading from feet, multicolored light effects, dynamic and powerful, 6 seconds
cuts.sora2_prompt: Magical girl transformation sequence, magic circle expanding, camera circling around character, brilliant colorful lights, powerful energy, anime style, 6 seconds

cuts.scene_description: 変身完了。魔法少女サクラのポーズ決め
cuts.action: 魔法の杖を持ち、決めポーズ。背景に星とリボンのエフェクト
cuts.image_prompt: medium shot, magical girl in transformed costume with wand, striking heroic pose, centered composition, magical girl outfit with ribbons and stars, dramatic spotlight from above, confident heroic expression, anime style, vibrant magical colors, 16:9
cuts.video_prompt: static shot of magical girl striking final transformation pose, ribbons and stars appearing around her, wand glowing, dramatic hero moment, 6 seconds, confident and powerful atmosphere

cuts.sora2_prompt: Magical girl finishing transformation pose, magical costume complete, wand shining, stars and ribbons appearing, dramatic hero moment, anime style, 6 seconds

cuts.scene_description: アクションシーン。魔法少女が空を飛び、闇の敵と対峙
cuts.action: 魔法の光弾を放ちながら、影の怪物に向かって飛翔
cuts.lighting: contrasting light and shadow, action lighting
cuts.image_prompt: wide shot, magical girl flying through night sky shooting light projectiles at shadow monster, diagonal dynamic composition, contrasting bright magic light and dark shadows, intense action scene, anime style, dramatic colors, 16:9

cuts.scene_description: 仲間の魔法少女たちが次々と登場
cuts.action: 3人の仲間が異なる色の光とともに着地。それぞれポーズ

cuts.scene_description: 4人が並んで大技の準備。魔力が集結
cuts.action: 全員で杖を掲げ、虹色の光が渦巻く。必殺技のチャージ

cuts.scene_description: 必殺技発動。巨大な虹色の光が闇を貫く
cuts.action: 圧倒的な光の波動が画面を満たし、闇が消滅していく

cuts.scene_description: タイトルロゴ登場。4人が笑顔で決めポーズ
cuts.action: 桜吹雪の中、4人が並んで決めポーズ。タイトルがキラキラと出現
